standardActions.name: Multiattack
standardActions.desc: The Moon Worm makes three melee attacks

standardActions.name: bite
standardActions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (4d12 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the moon worm can't bite another target.

standardActions.name: Slam
standardActions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

specialAbilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
specialAbilities.desc: If the moon worm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

specialAbilities.name: Reflective Shell
specialAbilities.desc: The moon wormâ€™s pearly shell has a 30% chance of re.lecting a line spell, a magic missile spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll. The spell re.lects back at the caster as though it originated from the moon worm, turning the caster into the target.
